cause.description:
Fight for a society worthy of Human Beings to live in, to replace the vile capitalist economic order on which the fundamental basis of our oppression lies, with true democratic Socialism worthy of the name.
1. For the Nationalisation under workers control of the economy.
2. All elected officials to receive the average workers wage, the right to recall, the abolishion of the standing army, the arming of the Working Class
3. For the independent organisation of the International Working Class as the fundamental prerequisite to Global Socialist Revolution
cause.mission: Victory of The Socialist Revolution over Capitalism Internationally.
cause.name: Socialism
